attributes.action: end access to our personal telephone records to over 795 public bodies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to show our objection to the move which was enacted by the personal decree of Home Secretary Jacqui Smith, which means that all land line and mobile call data can be recorded and used by 795 different public bodies.  We feel that access to all this personal data will further help to eradicate our civil liberties.
